entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Rigolet
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 11. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries late this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 11. Wind chill minus 19 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:30 AM NST Saturday 07 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 19. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries this evening and after midnight then partly cloudy. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h overnight. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 16 this evening and minus 29 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:30 AM NST Saturday 07 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Mainly sunny. Temperature steady near minus 18.
entry.summary: Clearing in the morning. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming southwest 20 gusting to 40 in the afternoon. Temperature steady near minus 18. Wind chill near minus 29. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:30 AM NST Saturday 07 January 2023
